item.title: About me
item.author: dylan@dyve.net (Dylan Verheul)
item.description: My name is Dylan Verheul. I live in The Netherlands. I am the co-founder of a citizen science platform that helps collect over 15 million nature observations per year. Through this blog I share ideas about programming and other things that I find interesting. Contact me @dyve or by e-mail.
